summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3036, for the improvement of East 80th Street, from Corliss Avenue to 20th Avenue Northeast; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 36595 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
